Pre-Game Insights: West Indies lead the series 2-1 after winning the first game in Trinidad and the second in Guyana, before India rebounded with a victory in the third, in Guyana.
West Indies captain Rovman Powell and India captain Hardik Pandya will lead their teams in the final two matches.

The teams feature some of the most dynamic and entertaining players in the cricket, including talismanic allrounder Jason Holder and wicket-keeper/batsman Nicholas Pooran for West Indies, and star performer Hardik Pandya and world stars such as Suryakumar Yadav for India.
Miscellaneous Highlights: At least 15,000 spectators are expected to attend the matches, traveling in from around the USA, the Caribbean and beyond.
A combined audience of over 200 million viewers will tune into the matches live on television and on their mobile devices.
The event is a great opportunity for Broward County Stadium as USA’s leading cricket venue to be showcasing two of the most exciting teams in world cricket ahead of next year’s World Cup.
